summary.Title: Assembly workers for unskilled work wanted for large company in Vejle

JobPositionInformation.PositionTitle: Assembly workers for unskilled work wanted for large company in Vejle
JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
Are you looking for an exciting full-time position that does not require experience and where you have the opportunity to earn good money?
- Then this position is interesting for you! Read more about the position here.

We are looking for fresh employees for an exciting company in Vejle, which deals with everything within the trailer industry.

This position does not require you to have experience, just that you are fresh and have your hands screwed on right, as your main task will be to assemble everything from recreational trailers to boat and sports trailers.

Day and evening shifts are available, with working hours being 07:00 to 15:30 on the day shift and 14:20 to 00:10 on the evening shift.

This position is for someone who is looking for a new challenge and would like to earn some good money without the need for experience.

You are perfect for this position if...

  • You are fresh and have the courage to work
  • You can use a screwdriver and other relevant tools
  • You are able to get to work and be independent

In return, we offer...

  • An exciting full-time position
  • Good employment conditions with good salary
  • Start as soon as possible

If this sounds like something for you, we look forward to receiving your application, which you can send to job@cooljobs.dk

If you would like more information about the position, please contact us on tel. +45 70 60 50 91

We look forward to hearing from you!
